Name: The Scuttle
About the game: The Scuttle is a short pirate adventure game set in a scaled down version of the Caribbean. Using navigational skills, you travel the seas following a series of quests to become the finest pirate captain! Customise your ship with rewards from killing enemies and completing quests. Fight epic battles against large sea forts and storm the beaches with your crewmates.
